attributes.action: Keep Free NHS prescriptions for over 60's
attributes.additional_details:
Allow the pensioners to keep their free prescriptions!
Some pentioners, are already choosing food over heating ect!
This is not on.
They have paid their way already, with prescriptions through out their working lives!
Leave the pentioners alone!
It's bad enough that their pensions are classed as a benefit, when they have paid there NI throughout there working life.
Now you want them to pay for prescriptions as well.
Doing this puts the elderly at high risk!
attributes.background:
Keep Free NHS Prescriptions!
People of pension age are already struggling with cost of living, and to possibly have to pay for their "needed" medication.
Is going to cause serious health issues!
